questions.text: What is the name of the malicious executable?
validation: Apply filter tcp.stream eq 16 || tcp contains exe
Right click on any packet and select follow TCP stream
Look for “this program cannot run in dos mode”

questions.text: What is the source IP address of the malicious download?
validation: Apply filter tcp.stream eq 16 || tcp contains exe

questions.text: What is the IP address of the IRC server?
For the DNS query,  which flag is set for the hostname www.ysbweb.com?
validation: look for 'Recursion desired: Do query recursively'
